relations.detail: L3M improves upon Multi-Pass Sieve by introducing a principled structured prediction approach with efficient inference.
relations.evidence: Unlike previous best-link techniques, learning in our case is performed jointly with decodingâ€”we present a novel latent structural SVM approach, optimized using a fast stochastic gradient-based technique.
relations.problem_addressed: Inefficiency and heuristic-based approaches in coreference resolution

relations.detail: L3M uses the ACE dataset for evaluation.
relations.evidence: Experiments on ACE and Ontonotes data show that L3M and its constrained version, CL3M, are more accurate than several state-of-the-art approaches.
relations.problem_addressed: Need for benchmarking on standard datasets

relations.detail: L3M uses the Ontonotes dataset for evaluation.
relations.evidence: Experiments on ACE and Ontonotes data show that L3M and its constrained version, CL3M, are more accurate than several state-of-the-art approaches.
relations.problem_addressed: Need for benchmarking on standard datasets

relations.detail: L3M uses F1 score as an evaluation metric.
relations.evidence: We report the F1 scores (%) on various coreference metrics (MUC, BCUB, CEAF).

relations.detail: L3M uses accuracy as an evaluation metric.
relations.evidence: Experiments on ACE and Ontonotes data show that L3M and its constrained version, CL3M, are more accurate than several state-of-the-art approaches.

relations.detail: CL3M extends L3M by incorporating domain knowledge-based constraints.
relations.evidence: CL3M augments L3M with knowledge-based constraints following (Roth and Yih, 2004; Denis and Baldridge, 2007).
relations.problem_addressed: Limited adaptability of L3M to domain-specific constraints

relations.detail: CL3M uses the ACE dataset for evaluation.
relations.evidence: Experiments on ACE and Ontonotes data show that CL3M, with just five constraints, compares favorably with other, more complicated, state-of-the-art algorithms.
relations.problem_addressed: Need for benchmarking on standard datasets

relations.detail: CL3M uses the Ontonotes dataset for evaluation.
relations.evidence: Experiments on ACE and Ontonotes data show that CL3M, with just five constraints, compares favorably with other, more complicated, state-of-the-art algorithms.
relations.problem_addressed: Need for benchmarking on standard datasets

relations.detail: CL3M uses F1 score as an evaluation metric.
relations.evidence: We report the F1 scores (%) on various coreference metrics (MUC, BCUB, CEAF).

relations.detail: CL3M uses accuracy as an evaluation metric.
relations.evidence: Experiments on ACE and Ontonotes data show that CL3M, with just five constraints, compares favorably with other, more complicated, state-of-the-art algorithms.

relations.detail: CL3M optimizes L3M by incorporating constraints to improve performance.
relations.evidence: CL3M, with just five constraints, compares favorably with other, more complicated, state-of-the-art algorithms on a variety of evaluation metrics.
relations.problem_addressed: Limited performance of L3M on certain datasets
